CSP Violation Event Type.name: CSP Violation Event Type
CSP Violation Event Type.description: CSP violation events capture details about blocked resource requests from Lightning Experience pages based on your content security policy (CSP).

COLUMN_NUMBER.description: For those violations, use this value with LINE_NUMBER to identify the location of the violation.

CONTEXT.description: CSP violation events capture details about blocked resource requests from only Lightning Experience pages, this value is always Lightning.

DIRECTIVE.description: font-src frame-src img-src media-src style-src script-src For information on these directives and a full list of all CSP directives, see MDN Web Docs: Content-Security-Policy.

DISPOSITION.description: enforce—Enforce the policy violation. For violations with this DISPOSITION, the resource request was blocked. report—Report the policy violation. For violations with this DISPOSITION, the resource request wasn’t blocked, but the violation was reported.
